name: Tuckernuck, Inc.
description: Operator of an online retail platform intended to provide classic and all-American lifestyle products. The company operates as an e-commerce platform selling clothing, accessories, home decor items, and gift products, enabling customers to get all types of home accessories and gift products under one roof at reasonable prices.
